name: Aimless needle
description:
Aimless needle is a survival adventure game where the player travels from island to island searching for pieces of a compass that can lead them home. The player can gather materials on the islands by chopping trees and killing monsters, the materials can later be used to craft tools and make upgrades to their ship.

List of features :
  • One island where the player can move around
  • An axe: players can pick up the axe at the start of the game and they can chop trees and inflict damage on enemies when the axe is selected
  • The player can pick up rocks and chopped trees around the island
  • Inventory bar: picked up items are displayed in the inventory, items can be selected and dropped
  • First enemy: the enemy has basic pathing and will approach the player character when they're close enough. The enemy inflicts damage over time
  • Win and lose conditions: the player wins when all enemies have been defeated, the player loses when their life points have been reduced to 0
  • Initial menus: main menu, win and death screen
